title.v: Lọc chi tiết theo đơn vị cơ sở

items.key: ma_dvcs in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where @@admin = 1 or ma_dvcs in (select ma_dvcs from sysunitlimits2 where user_id = @@userID) and status = '1')
items.check: ma_dvcs in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where @@admin = 1 or ma_dvcs in (select ma_dvcs from sysunitlimits2 where user_id = @@userID))

command.text: declare @roleAccess bit, @roleNew bit, @roleEdit bit, @roleDel bit if @@admin = 1 select @roleAccess = 1, @roleNew = 1, @roleEdit = 1, @roleDel = 1 else begin select @roleAccess = r_access, @roleNew = r_new, @roleEdit = r_edit, @roleDel = r_del from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID and ma_dvcs = @ma_dvcs end select '' as field, '' as message, 'this.grid._ownerRights = [' + rtrim(@roleAccess) + ',' + rtrim(@roleNew) + ',' + rtrim(@roleEdit) + ',' + rtrim(@roleDel) + '];' as script return
